translation.en: fed by a maid, until he was, like, 13 or somethin'.
translation.zh: 由女仆喂饭 直到13岁左右 （狐狸捕手按摩治疗师丹科隆）

translation.en: [Trevor Lewis] You know, his brothers and sisters were older.
translation.zh: 他的兄姐都很大

translation.en: So I get the sense he-- There was some loneliness growing up.
translation.zh: 所以我知道他的成长过程中是很孤单的

translation.en: His father had divorced and moved somewhere, I think.
translation.zh: 他的父亲离婚了 搬去了其他地方

translation.en: [Robbie] He's like, "You don't know how lucky you are to be able to talk to your father.
translation.zh: 他说过：“你不知道你可以和你父亲说话 这有多幸运

translation.en: I'd have to set up an appointment to see my father.
translation.zh: 我要见我父亲得先预约

translation.en: And half the time he wouldn't see me anyway."
translation.zh: 其中一半他还不见我”

translation.en: [Michael] This privileged lifestyle was great, but you know what?
translation.zh: 这种享有特权的生活方式很棒但你知道吗？

translation.en: He didn't have the socialization that kids develop naturally.
translation.zh: 他没有孩子自然发展的社交能力

translation.en: You know, when you're in your own neighborhood as a kid, and meeting the kid next door.
translation.zh: 小时候我们都在附近邻里认识隔壁的孩子

translation.en: He didn't have that.
translation.zh: 他没有这样的经历

translation.en: He just had his mom around mostly.
translation.zh: 大部分时间都是只有妈妈陪伴

translation.en: Welcome to Foxcatcher Farms.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到狐狸捕手农场

translation.zh: 这个房间是主要奖杯陈列室

translation.zh: 里面放了很多我们得的奖杯

translation.en: Mother is now going to be 90 years old in June.
translation.zh: 妈妈6月份就要满90岁了

translation.en: Her original... ribbons are here in this room someplace.
translation.zh: 她最初的绶带还在这个房间里什么地方

translation.en: [Michael] Mrs. du Pont was a real pillar in keeping John on track.
translation.zh: 杜邦夫人一直保证约翰走在正路上

translation.en: And then when she passed away, you know, there was a big void.
translation.zh: 她的去世是一个巨大的损失

translation.en: [Robbie] 1991 with the Eagle.
translation.zh: 老鹰的1991

translation.en: John, do you have any words for posterity? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 约翰 你对此有什么话说吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, Merry Christmas. -Merry--
translation.zh: -有 圣诞快乐-快乐…

translation.en: Happy New Year. Wrestle hard, wrestle fast.
translation.zh: 新年好 努力摔跤 快速摔跤

translation.en: [Michael] The Schultzes were there on the farm
translation.zh: 舒尔茨一家在农场里

translation.en: and they would come up to the big house during Christmases.
translation.zh: 他们会来大宅子过圣诞节

translation.en: They were the family to John at that point in time.
translation.zh: 当时这就是约翰的家人

translation.en: [Robbie] Alexander, how do you like turtle soup? How do you like turtle soup?
translation.zh: 亚历山大 你喜欢这个甲鱼汤吗？

translation.en: I don't like it at all.
translation.zh: 我一点都不喜欢

translation.en: [John] No, just that... It will be served, I promise.
translation.zh: 不 只是…我保证会上的

translation.en: [Nancy] He called me directly which he didn't call me very often, he just called the house,
translation.zh: 他直接给我电话他不经常这样 他打电话说

translation.en: and said, "Hey, Nancy, I don't think we have a high chair in the house,
translation.zh: “南希 我想家里没有高椅

translation.en: so remember to bring a high chair."
translation.zh: 所以记得带过来”

translation.en: And it really warmed my heart.
translation.zh: 这真让我觉得温暖

translation.en: He wanted to make that Christmas day something nice.
translation.zh: 他希望这个圣诞节感觉美好

translation.en: Something nice not only for him, but something nice for my kids.
translation.zh: 不仅是他觉得美好也让我儿子觉得美好

translation.en: [Nancy] And there was something inside of him that really was trying to connect.
translation.zh: 他内心深处是真的希望和人交流的

translation.en: Soar high together.
translation.zh: 一起高飞

translation.en: So I felt like, and I know Dave did, we kinda wanted to befriend the guy.
translation.zh: 所以我感觉 我知道大卫也是我们想要和这个人做朋友

translation.en: Especially if he was willing to help the sport. So you kind of felt like you should reach out to him
translation.zh: 特别是他希望帮助这项运动你就觉得想要去接触他

translation.en: 'cause he's reachin' out to the sport.
translation.zh: 因为他在接触这项运动

translation.en: [Dave] John du Pont's a very generous person, he's a very giving person.
translation.zh: 约翰杜邦是个很慷慨的人他很乐于给予

translation.en: I think he's, uh...
translation.zh: 我想他…

translation.en: I kind of look at him more as one of the athletes, I guess, than anything else.
translation.zh: 我把他看成是运动员之一

translation.en: You know, he likes to do the same things we do.
translation.zh: 他喜欢和我们做同样的事

translation.en: He likes to come in and wrestle and have fun.
translation.zh: 他喜欢来摔跤 很开心

translation.en: This doesn't work too well, I'm afraid.
translation.zh: 恐怕效果不会太好

translation.en: -I'm afraid to hurt Robbie, you know. -[Dave] I understand that.
translation.zh: -我怕会伤到罗比-我理解

translation.en: -I'll tell you when it hurts. -No, it's too late then. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -我疼的时候会告诉你-不 那就太晚了

translation.en: [Trevor] You're used to working out with somebody who's fit
translation.zh: 你习惯了和身体状态好的

translation.en: and who's trying to take you apart every day in a wrestling practice,
translation.zh: 每天都训练打倒你的人一起练习

translation.en: which is what you want. And then, you know...
translation.zh: 这是你想要的 然后 你知道…

translation.en: You could work out with John and he's, you know, say a 55-year-old guy,
translation.zh: 你就可以和约翰这位55岁的人练习

translation.en: um, kind of frail, you know, kind of slow, a little bit timid.
translation.zh: 有点儿脆弱 有点儿迟钝有点儿胆小

translation.en: And so, you'd wrestle with him, you'll let him score a bit, you know.
translation.zh: 你和他练习摔跤 你会让他得一点分

translation.en: It was kind of like play-wrestling.
translation.zh: 就好像是在玩摔跤

translation.en: And in his own mind, he's, "Yeah, I'm hanging with these guys."
translation.zh: 他自己会想“对 我在和他们一起玩”

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Going down to watch Eagle kick some ass in Cali, Colombia.
translation.zh: 去哥伦比亚卡利看老鹰收拾别人

translation.en: We're psyched.
translation.zh: 我们很激动

translation.zh: 约翰要参加摔跤锦标赛

translation.en: John... couldn't wrestle.
translation.zh: 约翰不会摔跤

translation.en: [Dave] Stance! Stance! Get your head in there!
translation.zh: 站位！头放在这里！

translation.en: [Chaid] Don't let him have your leg!
translation.zh: 别让他抓到你的腿！

translation.en: Oh, no! [grunts]
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [Dave] Let go of his head!
translation.zh: 放开他的头！

translation.en: Let go of his-- I told him to let go.
translation.zh: 放开他的…我跟他说了放开

translation.en: He's gonna get pinned now.
translation.zh: 他现在要被压制住了

translation.en: Let go of his head!
translation.zh: 放开他的头！

translation.en: Belly down, belly down, belly down. Oh!
translation.zh: 肚子向下

translation.en: [Robbie] Dave's getting paid X amount of dollars a year,
translation.zh: 大卫每年有若干收入

translation.en: and part of his duties were obviously that.
translation.zh: 他的部分责任显然就是这个

translation.en: That's why he coached John.
translation.zh: 所以他会给约翰当教练

translation.en: Well, you wanna see that better way to roll--
translation.zh: 你想看看更好的滚动方式…

translation.en: [John] Yeah, yeah...
translation.zh: 对…

translation.en: [Dave] You're locking here and rolling, right? [John] That's not the way I like to do it.
translation.zh: -你要锁定这里 滚动-我不想这样做

translation.en: I like to do it another way. But go ahead.
translation.zh: 我想用另外一种方式 不过来吧

translation.en: Okay, if you can,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你可以的话

translation.en: shove his head down then step over his head and lock.
translation.zh: 把他的头压下去 跨在他头上锁住

translation.en: [man] Oh, boy.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Ray] As much as John did sports, he was never an elite athlete.
translation.zh: 约翰尽管参与运动却一直不是一个优秀的运动员

translation.en: He could understand it, but he just...
translation.zh: 他可以理解 但就是…

translation.en: Down into his cells in his body...
translation.zh: 在他身体的每个细胞里…

translation.en: It takes something else, and he never had that.
translation.zh: 需要另外一种东西 是他所没有的

translation.en: [Dave] Don't let him pin ya!
translation.zh: 别让他压制住你！

translation.en: Get your arm out of there!
translation.zh: 把你的胳膊抽出来！

translation.en: Oh, that was it. That was it.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: [Greg] John du Pont wanted to be a world champion
translation.zh: 约翰杜邦想要当世界冠军

translation.en: like the world champions that he employed and had in his club.
translation.zh: 像那些他雇用过待在他俱乐部里的那些世界冠军一样

translation.en: And so he started a new style, essentially, called the Masters.
translation.zh: 他实际上开启了一种新风格名叫大师风格

translation.en: [Don] Well, Masters wrestling...
translation.zh: 大师摔跤…

translation.en: There's not a lot of guys still wrestling... into your 40s and 50s.
translation.zh: 不是很多人在四五十岁时还在摔跤

translation.en: [female announcer] Dear Mr. John du Pont,
translation.zh: 亲爱的约翰杜邦先生

translation.en: we are very grateful for all you have made here.
translation.zh: 我们非常感激你建立了这里

translation.en: Thank you very much for everything.
translation.zh: 感谢你做了这一切

translation.en: [John] Most of your athletes have made up their mind,
translation.zh: 你们大多数运动员都下定决心

translation.en: whether they wanna win or lose, when they go out to compete.
translation.zh: 无论他们出去比赛时 是输是赢

translation.en: They don't have that determination, that desire...
translation.zh: 他们没有那种决心 那种欲望

translation.en: the burning desire to win at all costs.
translation.zh: 那种不惜一切代价去赢的渴望

translation.en: [Ed] John just wanted so bad to be such a great wrestler,
translation.zh: 约翰只是非常希望可以做一个伟大的摔跤运动员

translation.en: and he couldn't do it physically.
translation.zh: 他在体力上无法做到了

translation.en: So, he had people help him do it.
translation.zh: 所以他让别人来帮他做

translation.en: [Michael] They're doing these, uh, staged events
translation.zh: 他们做一些表演性质的活动

translation.en: where you have these gorillas coming out to wrestle John
translation.zh: 有一些大块头的人出来和约翰摔跤

translation.en: and then rolling on their back and, you know...
translation.zh: 然后在地上滚动 然后…

translation.en: And John's the champion and the people are cheering his name.
translation.zh: 约翰赢得冠军 人们欢呼着他的名字

translation.en: It was... completely absurd.
translation.zh: 非常的荒谬

translation.en: [Brinzer] And then, somebody else on the farm is coming around
translation.zh: 然后 农场里的其他人过来

translation.en: with a bunch of cash afterward and, you know, paying the guy off.
translation.zh: 拿着一卷现金付给那个人

translation.en: [Don] In John's mind, he was actually wrestling the Bulgarian champ
translation.zh: 在约翰的头脑里他真的在和保加利亚的冠军摔跤

translation.en: and actually took him down.
translation.zh: 真的打倒了他

translation.en: And he thought it was real.
translation.zh: 他认为这是真实的

translation.en: Now, a lot of the guys knew that, you know,
translation.zh: 现在 许多人知道

translation.en: "Okay, we're just... we're doing this and... John thinks it's real.
translation.zh: “好吧 我们这样做…约翰认为是真的

translation.en: Okay, let's let him think it's real."
translation.zh: 好吧 我们就让他认为是真的吧”

translation.en: [Ed] So, I mean, it was just... it wasn't right.
translation.zh: 我是说 这样是不对的

translation.en: But we, you know, we wanted to make him--
translation.zh: 但我们想让他…

translation.en: He loved that stuff. He was so happy.
translation.zh: 他热爱这个 他很开心

translation.en: And everyone was just kind of pacifying the guy
translation.zh: 所有人都在安慰这个人

translation.en: because he was good for the sport.
translation.zh: 因为他对这项运动有好处

translation.en: If you go out there with that determination
translation.zh: 如果你带着这种信心出去

translation.en: and that desire and that fierceness, you will win.
translation.zh: 带着欲望和凶狠出去 你就会赢的

translation.en: And your future opponents will fear you.
translation.zh: 你未来的对手就会害怕你

translation.en: There are three things that always were a part of the estate.
translation.zh: 有三样东西一直是这个产业的组成部分

translation.en: The du Pont family, the wrestling...
translation.zh: 杜邦家族 摔跤…

translation.en: and then the hunting side.
translation.zh: 然后就是捕猎的事

translation.en: It was very difficult to be able to hunt on that estate.
translation.zh: 想要在这个地产上捕猎非常困难

translation.en: You had to be invited,
translation.zh: 必须被邀请

translation.en: and the people that controlled the hunting were the Newtown Square Police.
translation.zh: 控制捕猎的人是纽顿广场警署

translation.en: [man] They're cops. We better get out of here.
translation.zh: 他们是警察 我们最好离开这里

translation.en: [Robbie] Mr. Pherliam, what are you doing today?
translation.zh: 波利亚姆先生 你今天好吗？

translation.en: Not much. As little as possible at this point.
translation.zh: 不太好 这个时候不太可能好

translation.en: To be honest with you, it's getting close to quittin' time.
translation.zh: 跟你说实话 快到结束时间了

translation.en: -Yeah? -So...
translation.zh: -是吗？-所以…

translation.en: [Will] Dick Pherliam, who was the sergeant of police,
translation.zh: 狄克波利亚姆 警察队长

translation.en: he'd lived on the estate, he was one of the tenants.
translation.zh: 他住在这个地产上 是租客之一

translation.en: He had handled who would be permitted to hunt on the property.
translation.zh: 他来掌握谁可以在这个地产内捕猎

translation.en: [Tom Bergstrom] John had an awful lot of friends.
translation.zh: 约翰有许多朋友

translation.en: But I suspect that much of that was because he was, um, generous
translation.zh: 但我想这大部分是由于

translation.en: with respect to a lot of Delaware County institutions.
translation.zh: 他对特拉华县的一些机构都很慷慨

translation.en: He had an outdoor shooting range on the property
translation.zh: 他在地产上有户外射击场

translation.en: where we went to do our firearms training.
translation.zh: 我们都在那里进行武器训练

translation.en: [Dennis J. Anderson] He had a helicopter one time
translation.zh: 有段时间他有架直升飞机

translation.en: and he lent that out to surrounding townships if they needed it.
translation.zh: 需要的话他就借出来 巡视镇区

translation.en: He rode around town, you know, with officers. He had a uniform and everything.
translation.zh: 他和警官们一起巡视镇子他有警服和一切东西

translation.en: He was paid $1 a year just to be a reserve officer.
translation.zh: 他作为预备警官每年的薪水是一美金

translation.en: [Mike] We had a little hunting camp set up on the property,
translation.zh: 我们在地产上有个小小的狩猎营地

translation.en: and every hunting season, we would all meet up at the hunting camp
translation.zh: 每个狩猎季节我们都会在营地碰面

translation.en: and go hunting together.
translation.zh: 一起去打猎

translation.en: Most of the hunters were police officers.
translation.zh: 许多打猎的人就是警官

translation.en: [Ray] That was, you know...
translation.zh: 我当时 你知道…

translation.en: The thing about that place, it was like our own world.
translation.zh: 这个地方就像是我们自己的世界

translation.en: You could do so many things back there
translation.zh: 可以在这里做很多事情

translation.en: that the average person could not even consider doing.
translation.zh: 普通人可能连想都想不到

translation.en: [John] Come on, fall, fall.
translation.zh: 来吧 掉下来

translation.en: That's gonna fall, gonna fall.
translation.zh: 会掉下来的

translation.en: [Ray] And John himself would hunt out of the window of his town car with a rifle...
translation.zh: 约翰自己会在车窗里拿着来复枪打猎

translation.en: which was illegal in the area at the time.
translation.zh: 当时在这个地区这是违法的

translation.en: [Joe McGettigan] As a result of his connection with people of consequence
translation.zh: 因为他与重要人物的关系

translation.en: and his close personal relationship with the law enforcement in the county,
translation.zh: 以及与当地司法部门的个人关系

translation.en: he thought he could do what he wanted.
translation.zh: 他认为自己可以随心所欲

translation.en: He flew the, uh, Foxcatcher flag above the American flag on Foxcatcher.
translation.zh: 他在狐狸捕手将狐狸捕手的旗帜放在美国国旗之上

translation.en: He was the ultimate authority.
translation.zh: 他就是绝对的权威

translation.en: He thought this was, uh, du Pont Land.
translation.zh: 他认为这里是杜邦领地

translation.en: [newscaster] The advantages of being a multi-millionaire are fairly obvious.
translation.zh: 作为身价几百万的人这就是明显的优势所在

translation.en: But what are the disadvantages?
translation.zh: 但劣势是什么呢？

translation.en: There are many disadvantages to having money,
translation.zh: 有钱的劣势太多了

translation.en: and that is, you are targeted by a great number of people
translation.zh: 那就是你会成为一群人的目标

translation.en: who would like to take it away from you.
translation.zh: 都想要从你这里拿走些什么

translation.en: -[announcer] Mr. John du Pont. -[applause]
translation.zh: 约翰杜邦先生

translation.en: [Ray] He was a du Pont,
translation.zh: 他是杜邦家族的人

translation.en: and people were always after him to donate to this, to donate to that, to--
translation.zh: 人们总是追着他让他为这个为那个募捐…

translation.en: I think he'd been sued for some things that were real or not real.
translation.zh: 我想他曾因为几件或真或假的事情被起诉

translation.en: So many people were there to use John.
translation.zh: 有许多人都是利用约翰

translation.en: John had no idea who his real friends were, I don't believe.
translation.zh: 约翰不知道他真正的朋友是谁 我不相信

translation.en: [Trevor] I'm sure, in his own mind, he was trying to figure out, "Are these guys here 'cause they like me?
translation.zh: 我确信他在试图搞清楚“这些人来这是因为喜欢我吗？

translation.en: Or are they here 'cause, you know,
translation.zh: 我确信他在试图搞清楚“这些人来这是因为喜欢我吗？ 还是因为

translation.en: I'm providing this facility for them, or I'm paying them?"
translation.zh: 我为他们提供东西或是付钱给他们？”

translation.en: That probably played around in his mind over and over, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 我相信这个问题他一直在思考

translation.en: Guy's got a lot of money, he's living on a big property.
translation.zh: 他有很多钱 生活在广阔的土地上

translation.en: So, to me, it was like, "All right, a little paranoia was probably appropriate."
translation.zh: 对我来说 就好像“好吧 有点偏执或许是合适的”

translation.en: [inhales sharply] You know, I think it progressed a little bit further than that.
translation.zh: 我想之后情况又恶化了一点

translation.en: [Brian Dolph] He would actually videotape the woods across the field
translation.zh: 他会给遍布原野的树林摄像

translation.en: and he would tape it for hours on end.
translation.zh: 会拍上几个小时

translation.en: And then he'd sit and watch it, this still picture of the woods,
translation.zh: 然后他坐在那里看录像看静止的树林

translation.en: and he would try to get people to buy into things he was seeing in the woods.
translation.zh: 他会试图让人们相信他在树林里看到的东西

translation.en: [Trevor] "Okay, look at that. Tell me, do you see something moving in there?"
translation.zh: “好 看看这个 告诉我你看到那里有东西动吗？”

translation.en: And you'd say no and he'd...
translation.zh: 你说没有 他就…

translation.en: He'd get a little frustrated, you know, and then he'd fast forward.
translation.zh: 他就有点沮丧 然后就会快进…

translation.en: "All right, now look at this, this is where it is."
translation.zh: “看这里 应该在这里

translation.en: You know, "Look, look at this. Do you see something moving?"
translation.zh: 看这个 你看到有东西动了吗？”

translation.en: Or, "Do you see this?
translation.zh: 或是：“你看到了吗？

translation.en: Do you see a shape in there, or a form in there?"
translation.zh: 你看到这里有个形状吗？”

translation.en: And you'd... "No."
translation.zh: 你就说…“没有”

translation.en: [Guira] I thought maybe it's a psychological game he's playing.
translation.zh: 我以为或许他在玩心理游戏

translation.en: Or maybe it's just a power trip on his part, like,
translation.zh: 或许只是他的影响力试验 就好像

translation.en: "I wanna see if they'll just follow me and believe something."
translation.zh: “我要看看他们是否会跟随我相信这些”

translation.en: You know, when you're in that moment, situation,
translation.zh: 当你在那个时刻 那种状态下

translation.en: you're like... "Are you serious?" You know? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你会觉得：“你是认真的吗？”

translation.en: You can't just nod because, sometimes, he would mean it in psychosis or whatever.
translation.zh: 你不能只是点头因为有时候他是有些错乱的

translation.en: But other times, he would bait you.
translation.zh: 但另外的时候 他会引诱你

translation.en: He'd look out over the field and say, "You see those deer?
translation.zh: 他会看着原野说“你看到那些鹿吗？”

translation.en: They're really people dressed up as deer.
translation.zh: 它们是人穿成鹿的样子

translation.en: They're mechanical deer and someone's planting them there."
translation.zh: 它们是机械鹿 是有人放在那里的”

translation.en: And if you say, "Oh, yeah, John, I see what you mean,"
translation.zh: 如果你说“是的 约翰 我明白你说的了”

translation.en: he'll say, "No, they're not! They're really deer!"
translation.zh: 他就会说：“不 不是的！它们是真的鹿！”

translation.en: [Ed] There were guys that fueled his paranoia, you know,
translation.zh: 有人会鼓励他的妄想

translation.en: "Oh, yeah, maybe I see it."
translation.zh: 说：“对 或许我看到了”

translation.en: You know, those kind of comments would just get him to go even farther.
translation.zh: 这些评价会让他走得更远

translation.en: I generally went somewhat along with it, to a degree,
translation.zh: 我一般会跟随它达到一定程度

translation.en: just because my position was not one of great security. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 就因为我的位置不是太安全

translation.en: Whereas Dave Schultz,
translation.zh: 鉴于大卫舒尔茨

translation.en: being, in my opinion, the truest friend John had,
translation.zh: 在我看来他是约翰最可信任的朋友

translation.en: would not agree.
translation.zh: 不会同意

translation.en: [Larry] Some of the guys who stayed at Foxcatcher developed an affection for John.
translation.zh: 有些待在狐狸捕手的人开始喜欢约翰

translation.en: And Dave, probably more than anybody.
translation.zh: 而大卫比所有人都更喜欢

translation.en: Dave genuinely liked John and tried to help him.
translation.zh: 大卫真的喜欢约翰 并试图帮助他

translation.en: [Humphrey] We'd take turns staying with John, kind of watching him and making sure he was okay.
translation.zh: 我们轮流陪着约翰看着他确保他没事

translation.en: We'd do it in shifts, you know. Like, I'd leave at, like, 9:30,
translation.zh: 我们轮班看着 比如我9点半离开

translation.en: and after the kids would go to sleep, Dave and Valo would come up
translation.zh: 孩子们睡着之后 大卫和瓦伦廷

translation.en: and they'd hang out at the big house until, like, 11:00.
translation.zh: 会在大宅里待到11点左右

translation.en: It was very benign. You'd just sit over there and watch television,
translation.zh: 这非常亲切你可以坐在那里看电视

translation.en: or you'd go down and play pool.
translation.zh: 可以下楼去打台球

translation.en: It was an on-going process where he was helping us... be wrestlers,
translation.zh: 他在摔跤上给我们持续不断的帮助

translation.en: and we were trying to help him... to be social.
translation.zh: 我们也试图帮助他进行社交

translation.en: And, you know, that's kind of the way I always looked at it.
translation.zh: 我一直就是这样看待这件事的

translation.en: [Larry] You know, I felt sorry for John because he was so needy.
translation.zh: 我为约翰感到难过 因为他那么缺乏

translation.en: [Trevor] He would obsess on people and sort of wanna be around that person most of the time.
translation.zh: 他大部分时间都需要有人陪伴

translation.en: So, you know, when I came, I think it was probably Robbie.
translation.zh: 我去的时候 我想或许就是罗比

translation.en: Um, Dave was that person, I think, you know, while he was there.
translation.zh: 大卫在的时候就是大卫

translation.en: And Dan, the same kind of thing with Dan. You know, he'd really want to have Dan around.
translation.zh: 丹也一样他真的很想让丹就在身边

translation.en: Towards the end of the time I was there, it was Valentin.
translation.zh: 在我在那里的最后时期 是瓦伦廷

translation.en: [Chaid] How you doing today, Eagle?
translation.zh: 你今天怎么样 老鹰？

translation.en: Super. I'm ready.
translation.zh: 很好 我准备好了

translation.en: [Chaid] Here's an optimist. Always ready for a little action.
translation.zh: 他是个乐天派 总是准备好来点行动

translation.en: How you doing, Valo?
translation.zh: 你好吗 瓦伦廷？

translation.en: -Good. -Good.
translation.zh: -很好-很好

translation.en: I'm ready for Eagle.
translation.zh: 我做好准备迎战老鹰了

translation.en: -Are you ready for Eagle? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你做好准备迎战老鹰了？-对

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: [Trevor] Like, I'd be over at the big house
translation.zh: 我去大宅那里

translation.en: and he'd be like, "Okay, time to go. Valentin's coming."
translation.zh: 他会说“好吧 该走了 瓦伦廷来了”

translation.en: Sort of imply that "You leave now and Valentin's gonna sit down,
translation.zh: 暗示着：“你现在走 瓦伦廷会坐下

translation.en: and I'm gonna hang with him."
translation.zh: 我要和他一起玩”

translation.en: -[Chaid] Hey, Valo. -What's up, Dan?
translation.zh: -嘿 瓦伦廷-你好吗 丹？

translation.en: -You ready? -Yep.
translation.zh: -你准备好了？-是的

translation.en: [Trevor] There was a lot of Valentin, you know.
translation.zh: 瓦伦廷是很重要的

translation.en: And the more he would obsess over Valentin, the more he would obsess over this whole, uh,
translation.zh: 他越痴迷于瓦伦廷就越痴迷于这种感觉

translation.en: "I'm a Bulgarian."
translation.zh: “我是保加利亚人”

translation.en: [Larry] John started sponsoring the Bulgarian team.
translation.zh: 约翰开始赞助保加利亚队

translation.en: And he decided that he originally was Bulgarian.
translation.zh: 他认定自己来自于保加利亚

translation.en: He was a descendent of whomever.
translation.zh: 他是那里某个人的后裔

translation.en: [Trevor] I was like, "No, you're not. You're not Bulgarian. [chuckling] You guys are French.
translation.zh: 我说：“不 你不是保加利亚人你是法国人

translation.en: You're one of the most famous French families in the world."
translation.zh: 你们是世界上最著名的法国家族之一”

translation.en: [Trevor] He'd have none of that, you know.
translation.zh: 他根本不听

translation.en: "No, no, this is why I identify with Valentin,
translation.zh: “不 我为什么会这么认同瓦伦廷

translation.en: because of my Bulgarian heritage."
translation.zh: 就因为我是保加利亚后裔”

translation.en: [Nancy] John was frustrated, very frustrated,
translation.zh: 约翰很沮丧 非常沮丧

translation.en: because he wanted to be very close with Valentin Jordanov.
translation.zh: 因为他非常希望与瓦伦廷约尔丹诺亲密

translation.en: And Dave and Valo were very, very good friends.
translation.zh: 大卫和瓦伦廷是非常非常好的朋友

translation.en: So, I think there was a big jealousy of Dave.
translation.zh: 所以 我想他很嫉妒大卫

translation.en: [Valentin in Bulgarian] The last year there was noticeable tension.
translation.zh: 去年大家都注意到了一种紧张

translation.en: It was...
translation.zh: 是…

translation.en: like that. I can't tell you...
translation.zh: 是这样的 我没法告诉你…

translation.en: what was in his head.
translation.zh: 是关于他头脑里所想的

translation.en: [Dave chuckling] He can't talk. He's confused.
translation.zh: 他无法说话 他很困惑

translation.en: [Chaid chuckles] He's... He is. He's so--
translation.zh: 他的确是这样 他那么…

translation.en: I don't know if he's mad or not. -[Dave] We communicate telepathically. -Don't be mad, John.
translation.zh: -我不知道他是否疯了-我们靠心灵感应交流

translation.en: [Chaid] Come on, man, don't be mad at me.
translation.zh: 拜托 哥们 别对我生气

translation.en: I just gotta get a little tape-work here.
translation.zh: 我只是在拍些东西

translation.en: We sign in Bulgarian. We sign in Bulgarian.
translation.zh: 我们用保加利亚手语

translation.en: [Valentin] Yes. [Chaid laughing] Hilarious.
translation.zh: -对-真好笑

translation.en: I know you're fired up, man. I know I'm not--
translation.zh: 我知道你很生气 哥们我知道我…

translation.en: Fuck the world! I'm gonna kill 'em all!
translation.zh: 都见鬼去吧！我要把他们都杀了！

translation.en: [Chaid chuckling] Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: [Valentin] Oh, God. [Dave] This is gonna be a dark, bleak trip.
translation.zh: -哦 天啊-这段旅程会暗淡阴冷

translation.en: [Greg] We're talking about a triangle there.
translation.zh: 我们谈到一个三角形

translation.en: You know, where does du Pont fit with that really close friendship triangle?
translation.zh: 杜邦该如何在这段三角型的密友关系中自处？

translation.en: And du Pont was kind of outside the circle.
translation.zh: 杜邦有些置身事外

translation.en: Yeah, he said, "Fuck the world. Kill 'em all," I think.
translation.zh: 他说：“都见鬼去吧把他们都杀了”

translation.en: [Chaid laughing] Yeah, I think that was a direct quote.
translation.zh: 我想他就是这么说的

translation.en: -I think that was the quote. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我想就是这么说的-好吧

translation.en: [Michael] He observed how people did like to gravitate towards Dave.
translation.zh: 他观察到人们是如何被大卫所吸引

translation.en: And I think that sort of got to... it got to John a little bit.
translation.zh: 我想这有点儿让他生气

translation.en: [Robbie] You could just tell,
translation.zh: 你可以说

translation.en: because when John would go through some of his, like, fantasies,
translation.zh: 因为约翰有一些妄想

translation.en: sometimes he threw Dave in there.
translation.zh: 有时候他的妄想里会有大卫

translation.en: [Ray] He believed Dave Schultz and Rob Calabrese had a weather machine
translation.zh: 他相信大卫舒尔茨和罗伯卡拉布雷塞有一部天气机器

translation.en: and could control the weather.
translation.zh: 可以控制天气

translation.en: He also got convinced there were tunnels
translation.zh: 他还相信有地道

translation.en: going into the mansion, going out of the mansion,
translation.zh: 可以进出房子

translation.en: and that Dave Schultz used these tunnels to mess with him.
translation.zh: 大卫舒尔茨用这些地道来使他不爽

translation.en: [Chaid] Oh, what do we have here?
translation.zh: 这里是什么？

translation.en: [Guira] When it was, you know, getting bad, he'd be like, "There's people in the walls, and, um...
translation.zh: 情况开始糟糕时他会说“墙里面有人 而且…

translation.en: I think it's Schultz," or something.
translation.zh: 我想是舒尔茨”之类的话

translation.en: You know, he'd say something crazy like that.
translation.zh: 他说过这样的疯话

translation.en: And I'd say, "Dave Schultz isn't in your walls, John."
translation.zh: 我就说“大卫舒尔茨不在你的墙里 约翰”

translation.en: [man] Show us around your room.
translation.zh: 带我们看看你的房间

translation.en: [Guira] We were all like brothers on the estate. We trusted each other.
translation.zh: 在这个地产上我们都像兄弟我们彼此信任

translation.en: Hi, there.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: And du Pont, we trusted him up to a point.
translation.zh: 我们对杜邦的信任达到一种程度

translation.en: But, you know, the fact that he would hire a security firm to protect him...
translation.zh: 但事实是他会雇佣一个保安公司来保护他…

translation.en: And he would say that he's protecting him from one of us.
translation.zh: 他会说他要保护自己不受我们当中任何人的伤害

translation.en: [Patrick Goodale] Some friends from Secret Service contacted me and said
translation.zh: 特勤局的一些朋友联系我说

translation.en: that John du Pont had been involved with some... threats.
translation.zh: 约翰杜邦牵扯到一些威胁当中

translation.en: And so, that's what prompted him to reach out to us.
translation.zh: 这刺激他来寻求我们 （狐狸捕手保安帕特里克古德尔）

translation.en: [stammers] His security became an issue, and that's where things got creepy.
translation.zh: 他的安全成了问题事情开始变得诡异

translation.en: Him having these Special Force, FBI, CIA guys around him,
translation.zh: 他有特种部队联邦调查局 中情局的人在旁边

translation.en: John became super, hyper paranoid.
translation.zh: 约翰的妄想症开始极其严重

translation.en: [Patrick] It was tunnels, it was mechanical trees
translation.zh: 有地道 有机械树木

translation.en: which he thought were built by his father as props
translation.zh: 他认为是他父亲设置的

translation.en: for garden parties.
translation.zh: 为了开花园派对

translation.en: And so whether I believe it's a fact or not,
translation.zh: 不管我是否相信

translation.en: it's worth an investigation.
translation.zh: 总是值得调查一下

translation.en: So we started out with these low-level investigative efforts.
translation.zh: 所以我们开始了这些低水平的调查行动

translation.en: Dig a hole right there in the yard. Let's see what we find.
translation.zh: 在院子这里挖个洞看看会发现什么

translation.en: Let's bring a metal detector in and see what we find.
translation.zh: 找个金属探测器来看看会发现什么

translation.en: And then we got ever more sophisticated, as John kept insisting,
translation.zh: 然后我们变得更加细致因为约翰一直坚持

translation.en: and we brought in some technical equipment and some technical people.
translation.zh: 我们找来了技术设备和技术人员

translation.en: [Robbie] They would never say, "Oh, no one's in your walls."
translation.zh: 他们从来不会说“你的墙里面没有人”

translation.en: "We'll go in your walls and look. We'll get X-rays. We'll knock the walls down."
translation.zh: “我们进墙里面看一下我们有X光 我们把墙推倒”

translation.en: I'm like, "Why don't you just tell him no one's there?" You know?
translation.zh: 我就说：“你们为什么不告诉他里面没人？”

translation.en: It wasn't my job to question... what his concerns were,
translation.zh: 我没有权利质疑他的担心

translation.en: but to try to, uh, allay his fears.
translation.zh: 但我试图减轻他的恐惧

translation.en: In other words, to factually say,
translation.zh: 换句话说 我可以真实地说

translation.en: "This individual is not a threat for these reasons."
translation.zh: “这个人不会因为这些原因构成威胁”

translation.en: Or, "This doesn't exist."
translation.zh: 或是“这并不存在”

translation.en: [Nancy] John had definitely been acting worse, acting more erratic.
translation.zh: 约翰的举止越来越糟糕越来越不稳定

translation.en: It just kept getting stranger and stranger.
translation.zh: 变得越来越古怪

translation.en: [Greg] During that one period of time, the color black was something bad to him.
translation.zh: 在一段时期内黑颜色对他来说很不好

translation.en: [Robbie] He said that black was, uh, the color of death.
translation.zh: 他说黑色是死亡的颜色

translation.en: So he couldn't wear black shirts. He got rid of all the black horses.
translation.zh: 所以他不穿黑色衬衣除掉了所有黑色的马

translation.en: I had a black car, had to get rid of that.
translation.zh: 我有辆黑色的车 也不得不送走了

translation.en: -Hey, you looking at me? -[Chaid] Yeah.
translation.zh: -嘿 你在看我？-对

translation.en: [Robbie] And then, he'd fired all the athletes that were African American off the team.
translation.zh: 然后他把队里所有非裔美国人都赶走了

translation.en: Now, we start talking.
translation.zh: 现在 我们开始谈论

translation.en: "I mean, what's going on with this guy? Why would he do something like this?"
translation.zh: “这个人怎么了？他为什么要这样做？”

translation.en: [Greg] We talked to him about it.
translation.zh: 我们跟他谈这件事

translation.en: You know, "You really don't want to be in this position
translation.zh: “你真的不想把这件事

translation.en: of being perceived as racist on this."
translation.zh: 当作种族主义来看待”

translation.en: And he didn't buy into that and said,
translation.zh: 他也不相信这样 他说

translation.en: "Well, it's not that. I just don't want black."
translation.zh: “不是这样的我只是不想要黑色”

translation.en: Kevin Jackson was at the peak of his game.
translation.zh: 凯文杰克森当时处在事业巅峰

translation.en: And to have to call him up and say, "Kevin, I got bad news for you,"
translation.zh: 不得不打电话给他说“凯文 我有坏消息告诉你”

translation.en: was just heartbreaking.
translation.zh: 这太让人伤心了

translation.en: [Kevin] Greg had explained to me, "Yeah, he won't let me drive my black van on the property.
translation.zh: 格雷格对我解释“他不让我在这里开黑色车

translation.en: He's kicked off Pritchett and Fisher."
translation.zh: 他赶走了普利切特和费舍”

translation.en: And then he looks at me and says, "You, too."
translation.zh: 然后他看着我说：“还有你”

translation.en: And for me, I'm--
translation.zh: 对我来说 我…

translation.en: It's hard for me to believe because I'm already Olympic champion, world champion.
translation.zh: 我很难相信 因为我是奥运会冠军 世界冠军

translation.en: That's the last thing I expected.
translation.zh: 我绝对没想到会这样

translation.en: [Kenny] When that happened with Kevin Jackson,
translation.zh: 凯文杰克森遇到这事之后

translation.en: I felt that we should disassociate from du Pont at that point in time.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们需要从这时开始离开杜邦了

translation.en: And I was just purely asking for someone to hold him accountable for his actions.
translation.zh: 我只是需要有人让他对自己的行为负责任

translation.en: You got four, five black guys getting kicked off of a team
translation.zh: 有四五位黑人被主要赞助人

translation.en: by your main sponsor.
translation.zh: 赶出团队

translation.en: And nothing's done, nothing's said.
translation.zh: 却不作为 不说话

translation.en: And he's still VIP, still your main guy.
translation.zh: 他还是重要人物 还是大人物

translation.en: Maybe that should've been enough of a warning.
translation.zh: 或许这足可以成为一种警告

translation.en: But in any case, for whatever reason, we didn't really do anything about it at that point.
translation.zh: 但无论如何 当时我们没有就此有任何行动

translation.en: I guess, to some degree,
translation.zh: 我想 在某种程度上

translation.en: we were taking advantage financially of the benefits that we were getting.
translation.zh: 我们都在享受我们得到的经济利益

translation.en: [announcer] And there it is, final team score, 21 to 15.
translation.zh: 这是最终团队得分21比15

translation.en: -United States wins the World Cup. -[cheering]
translation.zh: 美国赢得了世界杯

translation.en: [John] Right now, it's about 2:00 in the morning.
translation.zh: 现在 是凌晨2点左右

translation.en: Had to entertain you and Dave at the big house.
translation.zh: 必须在大宅里让你和大卫开心

translation.en: Lots of fun.
translation.zh: 很好玩

translation.en: You know, this thing is really beautiful.
translation.zh: 你知道 这东西非常好看

translation.en: Some of the colors on it, the shine.
translation.zh: 有些颜色闪着光泽

translation.en: [Patrick] John became more and more nocturnal.
translation.zh: 约翰变得越来越喜欢夜间行事

translation.en: About 11:00 at night, he would get himself spun up.
translation.zh: 夜里11点左右 他会让自己焦虑

translation.en: And as we found out later, it was probably by virtue of chemical enhancement.
translation.zh: 后来我们发现 可能是因为他嗑药

translation.zh: 我之前就知道他用可卡因因为他晚上不睡觉

translation.en: I mean, I'd be at his house stayin', and he wouldn't sleep.
translation.zh: 我会在待在他的房子里他不睡觉

translation.en: I could hear him up walking the halls, you know, all night.
translation.zh: 我可以听到他整夜走来走去

translation.en: [Guira] You know, he became obsessed.
translation.zh: 他变得神经质

translation.en: I would, like, try and ask him about a piece of furniture,
translation.zh: 我试图问他关于某件家具

translation.en: but then he would slowly get into the wood grain of the furniture
translation.zh: 他慢慢就会沉浸到家具的木头纹理中

translation.en: and then actually seeing bugs or something or creatures.
translation.zh: 并会看到甲虫之类的东西

translation.en: [John] Whether you know it or not,
translation.zh: 不论你是否知道

translation.en: your little slime-bug friends had added to the golden gloss that it has.
translation.zh: 这些小小的甲虫会增加家具的金色光泽

translation.en: It would not have that if it had not been for them.
translation.zh: 如果没有它们 就不会这样

translation.en: What's this thing?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: There are all sorts of friends to go with you.
translation.zh: 有各种朋友和你在一起

translation.en: [Humphrey] He thought bugs were underneath his skin.
translation.zh: 他认为自己皮肤下有甲虫

translation.en: And he would scratch until they would bleed.
translation.zh: 他会一直抓直到出血

translation.zh: 有人故意开枪！马上叫救护车来！

translation.zh: -放松-他被打中好几枪！

translation.zh: 好了 女士你得把我需要的信息告诉我

translation.zh: -约翰杜邦开枪打的他？-对 他打的他！

translation.zh: 我的第一反应是我说：“约翰 你在干什么？”

translation.zh: 他回到房子里说

translation.zh: 特警队来到这里集结

translation.zh: 我们给他们讲了事情的大概

translation.zh: 我们知道他有很多武器许多手枪 来复枪

translation.zh: 我们知道宅子后面是一间图书室及安全室

translation.zh: 有一个保险库门

translation.zh: 我们知道他会藏在那里

translation.zh: 大卫能活下来

translation.zh: 我在指挥中心得到消息谈判在进行中

translation.zh: 嗯 达赖喇嘛在这里被包围

translation.zh: 一个诡异的故事开始流传

translation.zh: 涉及到一个暴力杀人犯以及重装待命的警察

translation.zh: 还涉及到巨大财富的继承人杜邦家族的人

translation.zh: 将自己的地产变成了巨大的堡垒

translation.zh: 我满脑子都是

translation.zh: 我妈妈来到家里

translation.zh: 把我和我姐姐带到楼上

translation.zh: 然后是周日 特警坚持这么久

translation.zh: 在严酷的天气条件下工作

translation.zh: 我告诉你我要做什么我和我的头儿谈一下…

translation.zh: 你和头儿谈一下 再给我电话…

translation.zh: 好 信不信由你他们在另外一条线路上找我

translation.zh: 他们告诉我可以

translation.zh: 好 我会从花园的门出去

translation.zh: 好 你会携带武器吗？

translation.zh: 请不要携带武器出来 好吗？

translation.zh: 好 我会穿黑色衣服

translation.zh: 带着我的保加利亚颜色出场

translation.zh: 然后我们在无线电中听到“他要出来了”

translation.zh: 然后他从房子的花园门出来

translation.zh: 今晚 在特拉华县杜邦地产上持续近50小时的对峙
